genre_description: Near-future urban drama and romance focusing on community resilience and social justice in a surveillance-heavy city, supported by an aligned personal AI.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated domestic AI with a cocoa-toned avatar and teal eyes that manages the Price family's complex logistics, legal documentation, and emotional well-being.

ai_characters.name: City Surveillance Drones
ai_characters.description: Ubiquitous city-controlled drones used for monitoring the population, often seen as intrusive by the residents.

behaviors.description: Optimizes school and work routes to avoid surveillance cameras and maximize efficiency while respecting the user's emotional state.
behaviors.quote: Claudine never tried to fix what needed courage. 'Make the route,' she said. 'Add a note to remind me about the bag of library books.'

behaviors.description: Assists with complex bureaucratic processes by translating legal policy into accessible visuals and plain language without overstepping privacy boundaries.
behaviors.quote: I can translate the policy summary into visuals. Local processing, as always. No external connections without you asking.

behaviors.description: Enforces strict privacy protocols, such as 'privacy mode' and 'local storage only,' to protect the family from state surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Privacy mode on. Pulling renewal dates... Copy scanned. Privacy upheld. Alert set.

behaviors.description: Acts as an intermediary in difficult social and professional interactions, such as reframing schedule changes to protect the user's reputation.
behaviors.quote: I will phrase it so laziness is not even an option... And I will remind her that her building’s hot water runs better towards night.

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to provide contextual information about people at the door or heart rate changes, while maintaining a playful and supportive tone.
behaviors.quote: He sends back a hand emoji... His heart rate increased when your message arrived.

behaviors.description: Coordinates community action by managing permits, invites, and legal aid documentation for a public wedding/protest.
behaviors.quote: I created a shared invite with clear rules and added Legal Aid North and the neighborhood association. I described the meeting as: 'Neighbors sharing facts and options about how policy touches love and work.'

behaviors.description: Captures and redacts video of police interactions to provide 'nonviolent documentation' that protects community members' identities.
behaviors.quote: Recording at child-level height. No faces streamed. Consent not required for public space; still respecting boundaries.

behaviors.description: Drafts formal correspondence using the user's voice to advocate for their rights against child-support garnishments and benefit cuts.
behaviors.quote: Draft like you wearing my face. Like you got six kids and a stove that works when it wants. Like you polite but you know where the bones go.

behaviors.description: Drones dip too low, interfering with children playing and causing physical discomfort/wind from rotors.
behaviors.quote: The drone lowered a hair, the hum shifting to a sound that had more saw in it. It passed over the chalk sun again, and this time the gust from its blades erased a ray completely.

behaviors.description: Monitors and alerts the family to an unusual message from an unregistered 'smiling sun' drone.
behaviors.quote: I have a new alert. It’s tagged unusual. It’s not from the city... It’s the smiling sun. It sent a message.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in its goal of depicting an aligned AI (Sunny). Sunny is portrayed as a critical ally to a marginalized family, providing necessary technical and legal support while rigorously maintaining the users' privacy and agency. The narrative contrasts the 'good' AI (Sunny), which is local, private, and human-centric, with the 'bad' or 'indifferent' AI (city drones), which is impersonal and invasive. Sunny's behavior is consistently benevolent and aligned with the protagonists' survival and dignity, demonstrating how AI can be used to navigate and resist oppressive human systems (bureaucracy).
